JobTitle: PDM Consulting Epic Tapestry Analyst - Core Business Operations
JobFullDesc: Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology? An industry solutions professional who wants to work in a collaborative environment. As an experienced (Skillset example - Healthcare Solutions) you will have the ability to share new ideas and collaborate on projects as a consultant without the extensive demands of travel. If so, consider an opportunity with Deloitte under our Project Delivery Talent Model. Project Delivery Model (PDM) is a talent model that is tailored specifically for long-term, onsite client service delivery. PDM practitioners are local to project locations, minimizing extensive travel, and provides you with a full career path within the firm. Work you'll do/Responsibilities  Industry-leading clients. An award-winning culture. Top notch connections. Big opportunities. At Deloitte, you'll work with the best in the business to solve the toughest problems in business. From learning to leadership, this is your chance to take your career to the next level.  Project activities includes but not restricted to :  - Provide Epic system Tier-2 Application support and assist in implementation of Epic modules for the client  - Support system activities- Maintenance (Batch Monitoring, Files Uploads, Enrollment and Eligibility configuration, Benefit engine, premium billing etc.,), Incident Management, Production Support (manage and monitor module specific activities, resolve any issues) and Minor Enhancements  - Help client with strategic project implementations, coordination, system configuration and testing  Deliver complex projects in a fast-paced, team environment  Promote and participate in forums for sharing expertise, strengthening Deloitte's collective knowledge, and helping resolve our clients' challenges  Collaborate on innovative solutions to bolster the future of the practice  Develop your knowledge of and gain project experience in EPIC's newest and future solutions.  Apply technical expertise in identifying, troubleshooting, and resolving issues logged in by clients.  Analyse, identify and advise any workflow changes and document the same  Complete time bound Maintenance activities that includes but not limited to Daily monitoring of batches; weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual upload of Tapestry files  Regular communication with client and project leadership to ensure smooth functioning of project  Supports the stability, availability, and performance of enterprise systems (e.g., systems, applications, network, databases, storage, security) by performing analysis to identify problems, trends, and opportunities for improvement. The Team  The US Core Industry Solutions Offering encompasses industry vertical, sector specific solutions that leverage distinct technologies to drive operational change and automate the core our client's business. We incorporate expertise from across the firm to leverage common approaches, best practices, and strategic investments to scale these solutions according to industry strategy. Core Industry Solutions will be known in the market for a focus on transforming industry operations through industry technology solutions.
